title: Testing JPA with TestContainers
content: Testcontainers is an open-source Java library that simplifies integration testing by providing lightweight, disposable containers for database systems, message brokers, and other third-party services. In this article we will learn how to combine Testcontainer with a JPA/Hibernate Test case.
